body.p:
State Capitol Hotel
Frankfort, Ky.
March 25th A. M.
To Honbl B McGoffin --
Sir,

It is proper that I inform you that I have returned from Hopkinsville, having been there a second time, to learn the prospect for a supply of water for the Institution, And also other facts, connected with the present condition of the patients. Should you desire any information upon these subjects I shall regard it my duty to present to yr Excellency such information as I possess.
